# Bank (Building)
## Overview
**Bank**

**Create** 39 Goods, 3 Influence, 35 Labor (1,570 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Guard Post (Room)|Guard Post]], 2 [[Office (Room)|Offices]], 1 [[Secret Room (Room)|Secret Room]], 1 [[Storefront (Room)|Storefront]], 2 [[Vaults]]

A secure building for storing coins and valuables, and for making loans to those in need.
